name: Olive Mid East
tagline: Leading web solutions company in UAE
description:
Olive is a leading enterprise and digital solutions company that provides Websites, Portal Devlopment, Enterprise Solutions like SAP, Sharepoint, Application Development, Mobility, Hosting and IT Consulting. The company is SAP EBM and Microsoft Certified Partner, with operations in Dubai (UAE), Oman, and India. It has rich experience in delivering business process integration, networking, infrastructure solutions, and digital marketing services.
With a state-of-art ISO 9001:2008 certified offshore development and support centre based in India, Olive leverages its deep industry expertise to offer solutions that meet the needs of its clients. The clients primarily include government, corporates, financial institutions, regional, international brands, and small to midsize organisations.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Bait Al Rawan, Bldg 166/1 Bawshar Street, Office 11
